item.title: Exploring UITFs in the Philippines
item.description: Introduction Exploring the Data Timeline Bank Portfolios Starting Capital Fund Categories Analyzing Performance Top Performing UITFs Performance by Fund Classification Analyzing Risk Conclusion Introduction This post is the second part of a series of posts about Unit Investment Trust Funds or UITFs in the Philippines. In this post, I’ll dive into the dataset produced in the previous post, looking to answer more specific questions such as:

item.title: Scraping Web Data on UITFs using R
item.description: Introduction Surveying active UITFs Gathering UITF symbols Cleaning up Augmenting the dataset Gathering UITF Information Merging all_uitfs and fund_info Scraping Historical Price Data Summary Introduction This post is an example of scraping the web for specific data we would like to have for analysis. In this example, I’m going to gather data on UITFs in the Philippines. UITFs or Unit Investment Trust Funds are a type of pooled funds, similar but still somewhat different to mutual funds.
